Summary: back road NC dark UFO warped reality!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Gatesville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving along back road in NC very dark outside felt pulsating presence and saw object hovering over forest line. Large swamp and forest, no houses near there. Felt our bodies heat up and I asked my partner how he felt and he said I knew you were going to ask that. Received communication that it was a Plaedian ship and felt very happy. Our car was then hit by a giant meaty dragon fly the size of a closed fist.
